subject: T.C. Ziraat Bank,Bankası A.
body:
T.C. Ziraat Bank,Bankası A.Ş., 
Sehit Muhtar Mh, Istiklal Cd. No:26, 34435 Beyoglu/Istanbul, Turkey.
Email: 
info@ziraatibanksi.com
, 
Email: 
customer.care@ziraatibanksi.com
Attn: 
 
Once Again, I am writing to inform you that your fund  is ready for wire transfer, as approved by the ministry of finance. this time however,I wish to confirm from you if Mr.Carlos E. Aviles  who is in our office for the same reason, has your mandate to receive your funds on your behalf as he stated that you are ill and hospitalized, Mr.Carlos E. Aviles  is from  Ohio, U.S.A. 
Because this office will not be liable to any wrong payment, kindly note that upon your confirmation of his mandate and authorization, we shall have no other option than to pay the funds into the following bank account detail, as submitted by Mr.Carlos E. Aviles :
Bank Name: Huntington Bank
Address: 41 South High Street, Columbus Ohio 43287 USA
Swift #:HUNTUS33     
Routing #:044-00002-4     
Account number: 04897258511 
Account Name: CARLOS E. AVILES .
He even enclosed a copy of his passport which I attached to you for Identification purposes.
Yours In Service,
Mr.Lucas Donald.

subject: Re:    T.C. Ziraat Bank,Bankası A.
body:
Hello Donald,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the update regarding my fund and the wire transfer. However, I must clarify that I do not know anyone by the name of E. Aviles from Ohio. It seems there might be some confusion or misunderstanding.

Could you please provide more information about E. Aviles and why he claims to have my mandate to receive the funds on my behalf? How did he come to know about my situation? Also, could you explain why he mentioned that I am ill?

I want to ensure that everything is in order before proceeding with any transactions. Your assistance in clarifying these matters would be greatly appreciated.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: From Donald
body:
T.C. Ziraat Bank,Bankası A.Ş., (https://mail.zoho.eu/zm/#) 
Sehit Muhtar Mh, Istiklal Cd. No:26, 34435 Beyoglu/Istanbul, Turkey Email: info@ziraatibanksi.com, (mailto:info@ziraatibanksi.com) Email: customer.care@ (mailto:customer.care@ziraatbk.org) ziraatibanksi.com 
Attn::Mary   , I hereby re-attach to you the so called Carlose E. Aviles who claimed, you are being hospitalized for your own perusal. Thank you for the information as we have an appointment with the so-called CARLOS E. AVILES . Later today  we will hand him over to the police so that he will be charged to court  for Impersonation and fraud. To enable you to receive your  $5.5M  . You hereby advised to send to us your receiving bank details as below: Your bank name and address: Your bank swift Code: Your  Account Number: If any bank routing Number: Account Name : Address: Tel: A copy of your ID: We assure you of our professional assistance always, you should please follow all instructions furnished to you by us, and also your swift response to our emails will be greatly appreciated. Yours In Service, 
Donald

subject: Re: From Donald
body:
Hello Donald,

Thank you for reaching out to me. How can I assist you today?

Best wishes,
Mary
